name: Eclipse Creative Consultants

description:
Eclipse Creative Consultants is an award winning full service web design and brand design consultancy based in Chester, Cheshire.Â 
We deliver a complete and bespoke creative service to businesses in and around Chester operating in a diverse range of sectors including new homes, retail, leisure and business to business, as well as education and the emergency services.
